title: Calories in One Starburst
meta_description: Discover calories in one Starburst, including carbs, sugars, and full nutrition breakdown per piece, plus tweaks and FAQs for candy lovers.
assumptions: Original fruit flavor, one standard piece (approx. 5 g), unwrapped chewy candy; no added ingredients.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, brand, exact size, and manufacturing; check packaging for precise values.

quick_answer.text: One Starburst provides about 20 kcal, mostly from sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: FaveREDs flavor (slightly higher sugar, per piece)
Wrapped (negligible, but includes paper weight if measured)

faqs.q: How many calories in one Starburst?
What are the carbs in one Starburst?
faqs.a: About 4.5 g carbs, with 3.5 g sugars and 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: Does one Starburst have fat or protein?
faqs.a: Negligible: 0.3 g fat (0.2 g saturated) and 0 g protein.

faqs.q: Are Starburst calories the same for all flavors?
faqs.a: Mostly yes, but some like FaveREDs may vary slightly by 1-2 kcal.

faqs.q: How does one Starburst compare to other candies?
faqs.a: Similar to one small gummy; lower than chocolate pieces but high in sugars.
